Original title: The Sandlot

Synopsis:
---------
In the early 60's Scotty Smalls (Tom Guiry), a student of fifth, moved to a new town with her parents (Karen Allen and Denis Leary). The kids call him for not knowing memo throw a baseball. But everything changes when the leader of the neighborhood gang asks him to play with them in the open. It is the beginning of a magical summer of baseball, wild adventures, first kisses and terrifying confrontations with creepy beast and its owner (James Earl Jones) who live behind a fence bordering the clearing. Soon, nine boys just becoming inseparable, Scotty gets into the team and its leader becomes local legend.
